strengths.title: Low Fees
strengths.description:
Transaction fees on Gravity are significantly lower than on the main blockchain. This makes it more affordable for users to send and receive crypto.
*   **Security**: Gravity leverages the security of the main blockchain. This means users can enjoy faster and cheaper transactions without compromising the safety of their funds.

strengths.title: 8. Weaknesses
strengths.description:
*   **Complexity**: Layer 2 solutions can be more complex to understand than main blockchains. This might make it harder for new users to get started.
*   **Centralization Risks**: Some Layer 2 solutions can be more centralized than main blockchains. It's important to understand the level of decentralization in Gravity's design.
*   **Adoption**: While growing, Gravity's adoption is still less than main blockchains. More users and applications are needed for it to reach its full potential.

strengths.title: 9. Whitepaper Summary
strengths.description: The Gravity (GZRO) whitepaper outlines a solution to the scalability issues plaguing many blockchains. Gravity aims to provide faster and cheaper transactions by operating as a Layer 2 solution built on top of an existing blockchain. The core innovation lies in its efficient transaction processing mechanism, allowing for a higher throughput than the main chain. The GZRO token is used to incentivize participation in the network, reward validators, and pay for transaction fees. By addressing the limitations of scalability, Gravity seeks to make blockchain technology more accessible and practical for everyday use cases, fostering wider adoption and enabling new applications in areas like DeFi and gaming. The whitepaper details the technical architecture, consensus mechanism, and economic model designed to achieve these goals.

weaknesses.title: Centralization Risks
weaknesses.description:

*   **Adoption**: While growing, Gravity's adoption is still less than main blockchains. More users and applications are needed for it to reach its full potential.

whitepaper.summary: The project provides a blockchain-based solution that addresses key challenges in its sector. It utilizes innovative technology to create value for users and token holders while maintaining security and efficiency.
